title: Rolled lemon pancakes with blueberries and yoghurt
description: These delicious pancakes combine coconut, lemon and blueberry for a lipsmacking dessert that is low in added sugar. This meal provides 406 kcal, 13.5g protein, 40g carbohydrate (of which 18g sugars), 21g fat (of which 14g saturates), 7g fibre and 1.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 150g/5oz full-fat probiotic yoghurt or coconut-flavoured Greek-style yoghurt
